ch0026_40_akane/0101_0701_01_10:
Well, if it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Don’t you just look full of energy today.
ch0026_40_akane/0101_0701_02_10:
All right! Well, don’t just share that energy with
me! Let’s go out and share it all over Pasio!
ch0026_40_akane/7101_0701_01_10:
I’m gonna teach you the secret to having fun at
events and festivals and stuff like that!
ch0026_40_akane/7101_0701_02_10:
Here it is: two people are better than one...and
three are better than two!
ch0026_40_akane/7101_0701_03_10:
The more friends you have with you, the more FUN
you’ll have! That’s all there is to it!
ch0026_40_akane/7102_0701_01_10: Sawsbuck are really clever and kind Pokémon!
ch0026_40_akane/7102_0701_02_10:
Whenever I’m shiverin’ from the cold, my
Sawsbuck snuggles right up beside me.
ch0026_40_akane/7102_0701_03_10:
Her kindness warms my body AND my heart! Ain’t
she just the most precious partner?
ch0026_40_akane/7103_0701_01_10: Hey! Ain’t these clothes just the cutest?
ch0026_40_akane/7103_0701_02_10: I just keep gettin’ prettier and prettier!
ch0026_40_akane/7103_0701_03_10:
I’m so cute, everyone all over Pasio’s gonna end
up infatuated with me!
ch0026_40_akane/7104_0701_01_10:
Y’know what they say, right? You’ll get presents if
you’ve been nice all year...
ch0026_40_akane/7104_0701_02_10: Sawsbuck and I will get presents for sure!
ch0026_40_akane/7104_0701_03_10: We’re the nicest there is, after all!
ch0026_40_akane/7105_0701_01_10:
I love parties, but I really DON’T like it when
they’re over.
ch0026_40_akane/7105_0701_02_10:
After everyone says good-bye, I’m left all by
myself—all lonely!
ch0026_40_akane/7105_0701_03_10:
So you know what? I’m gonna have you stay
right by my side, even after the party’s over!
ch0026_40_akane/1701_0701_01_10:
This is a super special gift! I really put my heart
and soul into it!
ch0026_40_akane/1701_0702_01_10:
So? How ’bout it? Ain’t ya just the happiest after
gettin’ my present?
ch0026_40_akane/2501_0701_01_10:
I make it through cold days by drinkin’ warmed-up
Moomoo Milk!
ch0026_40_akane/2501_0701_02_10:
I mean, I COULD put on some warm clothes,
I s’pose, but then I wouldn’t look as pretty,
would I?
ch0026_40_akane/2501_0701_03_10:
After all, everyone’s comin’ to see the Whitney
they know and love—full of life and chattin’ up
a storm!
ch0026_40_akane/2501_0701_04_10:
What good am I if I’m standin’ there all bundled
up with chatterin’ teeth?
ch0026_40_akane/2501_0702_01_10:
There’re lots of things I’ve gotta worry about
besides Pokémon battles...
ch0026_40_akane/2501_0702_02_10: Being a Gym Leader ain’t easy, y’know!
ch0026_40_akane/2511_0701_01_10:
Y’know, I’ve been thinkin’. What kind of present
would you love to get more than anything else?
ch0026_40_akane/2511_0701_02_10:
Here’s my guess: a Pokémon battle!
Am I right?
ch0026_40_akane/2511_0701_03_10:
If I am, you know I’m great at battles, and I’ll be
your opponent anytime!
ch0026_40_akane/2511_0702_01_10:
Just ’cause I said I’d give you a Pokémon battle as
a present doesn’t mean I’m gonna let you win!
ch0026_40_akane/2511_0702_02_10:
Once I’ve decided I’m gonna battle, I give it
everythin’ I’ve got!
ch0026_40_akane/3001_0701_01_10:
Mornin’! I’ve been all excited ever since I got up
today. I just can’t seem to sit still!
ch0026_40_akane/3003_0701_01_10:
I was plannin’ on givin’ you a present today...but
that’ll have to wait till later!
ch0026_40_akane/3005_0701_01_10:
Tonight, I just wanna eat all my favorite foods and
have a blast with everyone!
